name: TabMania
description: A simple tab manager enabling some essential keyboard shortcuts

00back.description: Go back to the last active tab

01fwd.description: Go forward to the next active tab

02los.description: Clipboard launch/search: open a new tab using the clipboard value as URL or search text

03closeback.description: Close the current tab and go back to the last active tab

04closefwd.description: Close the current tab and go forward to the next active tab

90shortcut.description: Custom shortcut 1: open a configured tab

91shortcut.description: Custom shortcut 2: open a configured tab

92shortcut.description: Custom shortcut 3: open a configured tab

93shortcut.description: Custom shortcut 4: open a configured tab

94shortcut.description: Custom shortcut 5: open a configured tab
